title: Ground News - Reuters report on Taiwan rock band is fake news, says Chinese mainland spokesperson
text:
Summary by CGTN A Chinese mainland spokesperson on Thursday refuted a recent report by Reuters claiming that the mainland's authorities have "pressured" a rock band from Taiwan called Mayday to make favorable comments, stressing that it is ungrounded fake news. Share menu More
